title: Dark Lava
description:
Maui is sacred places, ancient artifacts, and the dark lava of deepest passions.
  Nothing ever goes easy for detectives Lei Texeira and Michael Stevens. An investigation into heiau desecrations must take a back seat to the emergence of an enemy who targets those closest to them, leaving shrouds as a calling card. Lei and Stevens face challenges of the body, mind and heart in this seventh in the bestselling Lei Crime Series.  “Neal is a powerful writer, and her prose is often effortless and elegant.” Kirkus Reviews
author: Toby Neal
